Before long, Jack got carried too far away. He noticed that he couldn't see Jill anymore. He was starting to get scared. 
Suddenly, Jill swam to him and said, "Don't worry! Attach yourself to me and we won't drift away." 
Jack and Jill stayed together, happy and safe while they enjoyed the beach and the waves.
They learnt that the moral of the story was that it is important to stay close together and look out for each other, especially when we are in unfamiliar places.
